Object.Field: alter table SNP_LPI_RUN add EXEC_MODE NUMERIC(4) NULL
alter table SNP_STEP_LOG add EXECUTION_ORDER NUMERIC(10) NULL
alter table SNP_STEP_REPORT add EXECUTION_ORDER NUMERIC(10) NULL
create index SESS_LS_SEQ_FK on SNP_SESS_TASK_LS ( SESS_NO , SEQ_NAME )
create index SESS_LV_VAR_FK on SNP_SESS_STEP_LV ( SESS_NO , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_SESS_TASK_LS add constraint FK_SESS_LS_SEQ foreign key ( SESS_NO , SEQ_NAME ) references SNP_SEQ_SESS ( SESS_NO , SEQ_NAME )
alter table SNP_SESS_STEP_LV add constraint FK_SESS_LV_VAR foreign key ( SESS_NO , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_VAR_SESS ( SESS_NO , VAR_NAME )
